src: سجل تشاد هدفاً بعد أخذ نصيحة من مدربه.
mt: Chad scored a goal after taking advice from their coach.
ref: Chad scored a touchdown after asking his coach for advice.

src: اتصلت زوجته الخائنة بالشرطة وتم اعتقاله.
mt: His unfaithful wife called the police and he was arrested.
ref: His cheating wife called the police and he was arrested.

src: اشترى ايفان طارد للبعوض لنزهته القادمة.
mt: Ivan bought a mosquito net for his upcoming camping trip.
ref: Ivan bought mosquito repellent for his next hike.

src: كان على بايج الاعتماد على أصدقائها بسبب دعمهم.
mt: Paige had to rely on her friends for support.
ref: Paige had to rely on her friends for their support.

src: كان جون مسروراً لطلب الخروج معها في موعد.
mt: John was happy to be asked out on a date.
ref: John was glad he asked her on a date.

src: كان صوت الناي جميلاً.
mt: The sound of the flute was beautiful.
ref: The flute sounded beautiful.

src: كانت الرحلة ممتعة جداً لماجي.
mt: Maggie had a great flight.
ref: The ride was very fun for Maggie.
